greetings.text: My name is Pedro Leal, I'm a Software Engineer from Brazil with over 3 years of experience in web development. I currently work with ReactJS and Typescript.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on:

projects-list-descriptions.abexpay: Marketplace platform for debt installment payments.
projects-list-descriptions.fast-store: Personal project of a fake e-commerce. Developed with the intention of practicing my studies.
projects-list-descriptions.monitore: Infrastructure monitoring application through management of logs, instances and services.
projects-list-descriptions.portfolio-v2: Repository of the project you are viewing now. A revamp of my old portfolio using new technologies!
